title: Guava BBQ Sauce
ingredients: ['250ml cold water', '250g guava paste (pasta de guayaba)', '75ml apple cider vinegar', '4 tablespoons dark rum', '4 tablespoons tomato puree', '4 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '2 tablespoons finely chopped onion', '1 tablespoon finely chopped fresh root ginger', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '2 teaspoons tomato ketchup', '2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1/4 Scotch bonnet chilli, finely chopped or to taste', 'sea salt and pepper to taste']
